author: Martin Rogers — @MrogersFOX
title: Hard Rock Stadium becoming a coronavirus testing site is part of a long tradition of sports helping out in crises
description: Just over seven weeks after hosting Super Bowl LIV, Hard Rock Stadium is part of the fight to save lives from the coronavirus.
content:
It feels a lot longer than 52 days ago, doesnt it, when Super Bowl LIV sparkled its way into Miami, one of its favorite, most-visited, and if were truthful about it best locations.
Back then, the most pressing topic of conversation was the recent passing of … [+4382 chars]
